specifications.description: The AC Hard-wire Video Doorbell provides a secure and convenient way to monitor your home. Featuring a 2MP CMOS sensor and full HD 1080p video, it offers clear live view and recording capabilities.  Connect via Wi-Fi for remote viewing and control, or utilize the hard-wire AC 12-24V power source for a reliable power supply.  Integrated IR night vision ensures visibility in low-light conditions. Enjoy two-way audio communication with visitors, and deter potential intruders with a built-in siren alarm.  Advanced human and sound detection alerts you to activity. The IP65 weatherproof rating ensures durability in various weather conditions.  Local storage is available via a Micro SD card slot (up to 128GB), with optional cloud storage integration for enhanced security and accessibility.  An indoor chime provides audible notification upon doorbell press.  The 100-degree fixed focus lens captures a wide field of view.  The product includes a power switch and reset button for easy operation and maintenance.

specifications.description: The 2K Video Doorbell provides a secure and convenient way to monitor your home. Featuring crystal-clear 2K HD video at 1536x2048 resolution, this doorbell offers exceptional image quality for detailed viewing. The fixed 2.5mm lens provides a wide 170° diagonal field of view, capturing a comprehensive view of your entryway.  Advanced motion, human, and package detection algorithms alert you to activity, even when you're not home.  The included digital chime and app-based function settings allow for customized notifications and control.  Built-in Bluetooth LE and Wi-Fi connectivity enables seamless integration with your home network.  The IP65-rated design ensures durability and protection against the elements.  Powered by a long-lasting 5200mAh lithium battery, the doorbell offers extended operation.  A tamper alarm provides added security, alerting you to any unauthorized attempts to tamper with the device.  Easy to install and use, the 2K Video Doorbell is a valuable addition to any home.

specifications.description: The Outdoor 4G Battery Camera provides reliable surveillance with 2K/1080p live streaming and recording capabilities. Leveraging a 4G LTE network, it allows for remote monitoring and control from anywhere. Equipped with infrared (IR) night vision, it ensures clear visibility in low-light conditions. The 100-degree wide-angle lens captures a broad field of view, while the pan and tilt functionality, controlled via a dedicated mobile app, enables flexible monitoring angles. The camera utilizes human motion detection to trigger recording and notifications via the app. Local storage is supported via a Micro SD card slot, providing a secure and independent recording solution.  Built to withstand outdoor elements, the camera is weatherproof with an IP65 rating, ensuring durability in various environmental conditions.  It also features a built-in microphone for audio recording.

This innovative device combines a spacious food bowl with a continuously flowing water fountain, promoting healthy eating and drinking habits.  It features Wi-Fi connectivity for remote monitoring and control via a user-friendly mobile app (iOS & Android compatible).  The fountain's design encourages natural drinking behavior, while the feeder ensures consistent food availability.  Easy to clean and durable, this product is designed for long-lasting use and peace of mind.

specifications.description: The SmartView Baby Monitor provides parents with a comprehensive and secure way to monitor their child's well-being from anywhere. Featuring crystal-clear 2K/1080p live video, a wide 100-degree viewing angle, and a 355° pan/tilt capability controlled via a user-friendly mobile app, the SmartView offers unparalleled flexibility.  Integrated with advanced sensors, it detects temperature fluctuations and alerts parents to potential discomfort.  The built-in night lamp and siren alarm provide added peace of mind, while the two-way audio allows for comforting communication.  The monitor supports local storage up to 128GB for extended recording and features a smart clock for convenient timekeeping.  Powered by Type-C charging, the SmartView is designed for long-lasting use.  The one-press call-out feature enables quick and easy communication with your baby.

specifications.description: The Control Panel MAX is a powerful and versatile smart control panel designed for seamless integration with a wide range of smart home devices. Featuring a vibrant 10.1-inch HD multi-touch display, it provides an intuitive interface for controlling lighting, climate, security systems, and more.  The integrated Zigbee and BLE Mesh gateways enable robust and reliable connectivity to numerous smart devices.  Users can control devices via a dedicated mobile application, voice commands (compatible with popular voice assistants), or through the built-in intercom system.  Four customizable physical buttons offer quick access to frequently used functions.  The panel supports a large number of Zigbee devices (128+) and offers a stable and secure wireless network connection.

specifications.description: The Intelligent Control Panel is a versatile smart home hub designed for seamless integration with various smart devices. Featuring a user-friendly Android 11 interface and a responsive 4-inch capacitive touchscreen, it simplifies home automation. Control lighting, switches, sockets, AC units, and curtains with ease, and manage them in groups for centralized control. The panel utilizes the Zigbee protocol for robust and reliable wireless communication with a wide range of compatible devices. It offers flexible power options, supporting both AC 110-250V and 12V-24V DC power supplies.  Two relay channels with a combined load capacity of under 200W provide control over appliances.  Integrated I/O includes audio in/out, a 485 communication port, and a timing output for advanced automation scenarios. Bluetooth connectivity enables easy pairing with other devices.  The panel is designed for standard UK 86 bottom shell installation and boasts compact dimensions of 86x86x11mm.  Media playback is supported via TF card, USB, and Bluetooth audio streaming. Available in black and white color options.

specifications.description: The Smart Gas Sensor provides comprehensive natural gas detection and alerts, offering peace of mind for homes and businesses. Featuring a sleek, minimalist design and long-lasting battery life, this sensor seamlessly integrates into any environment. It utilizes ZigBee wireless technology for reliable communication and offers multiple alarm options – local audible and visual alerts, and remote notifications via a dedicated mobile application.  The sensor is designed for easy installation on ceilings or walls and is built to withstand a wide range of environmental conditions. It is a crucial component for ensuring safe and healthy living spaces.

specifications.description: The 4G Gateway is a robust and versatile smart gateway designed to connect various IoT devices and systems to a wide range of networks. Built with a durable metal enclosure, it supports multiple connectivity options, including cellular 4G, Wi-Fi, Ethernet, Zigbee, and Bluetooth. The external antenna enhances signal strength and range. It offers flexible power options via 5V/2A DC power or Power over Ethernet (PoE) for seamless integration into existing network infrastructure. This gateway is ideal for applications requiring reliable connectivity in diverse environments.

specifications.description: The Wired Matter Gateway is a robust and versatile smart home hub designed to seamlessly integrate a wide range of smart devices into your home network. It supports leading smart home platforms (Apple HomeKit, Google Home, Amazon Alexa) and offers compatibility with a rich ecosystem of sub-devices.  This gateway provides reliable connectivity for both Tuya Thread devices and Matter over Thread devices, ensuring broad device support.  Utilizing a wired Ethernet connection, the gateway allows for stable and secure network control.  Its compact design and durable construction make it an ideal addition to any smart home setup.

specifications.description: The Smart Radiator Valve is a smart thermostat designed for precise and convenient control of your radiator heating system. It offers comprehensive functionality including app control, voice control integration, stroke distance detection for accurate temperature adjustment, and open window detection to prevent energy waste.  The valve utilizes Zigbee 3.0 for a stable and low-power wireless connection, ensuring reliable operation within your smart home ecosystem.  It features an NTC temperature sensor for accurate readings and is equipped with anti-freeze protection to safeguard against freezing temperatures.  The valve is easily programmable to create customized heating schedules, optimizing comfort and energy efficiency.  It is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Home voice assistants.  The valve is designed for easy installation with an M30*1.5mm connection.

specifications.description: The Stick Logger is a versatile smart electrical monitoring device designed to provide comprehensive data on inverter performance and power generation. This compact, plug-and-play logger seamlessly integrates with a wide range of inverter brands, offering real-time insights into operational status and energy production. The Stick Logger is ideal for residential, commercial, and industrial applications, providing valuable data for energy audits, performance analysis, and troubleshooting.

specifications.description: The Balcony Energy Storage system is a compact, smart solution for residential solar energy storage. This Home-ESS grade system utilizes a high-capacity Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) battery to store excess solar energy generated on your balcony, allowing you to utilize it during periods of low sunlight or at night.  It features an integrated Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) controller for optimal solar panel performance, direct PV input for seamless integration with solar panels, and easy plug-and-play MC4 connectors for simplified installation. The system is designed for easy commissioning and provides a reliable backup power source.  With its IP65 rating, it's built to withstand outdoor conditions.  The expandable capacity allows for customization to meet varying energy needs, and the robust LFP battery offers a long lifespan.  This system is ideal for homeowners seeking to reduce reliance on the grid and promote energy independence.

specifications.description: The 4-Gang Scene Switch (PC) is a versatile smart switch designed for enhanced home automation. This device allows for the control of up to four distinct scenes, each dedicated to a specific function like road lighting or street lamp operation.  It operates with zero live wire installation, offering a safe and convenient upgrade to your existing electrical system.  Leveraging ZigBee 3.0 connectivity, it seamlessly integrates with a wide range of smart home ecosystems and platforms.  The switch features intuitive button control, a bright backlight for easy operation in low-light conditions, and intelligent human body sensing for automated activation.  Control is accessible through a user-friendly mobile application (APP) and voice assistants.  Built-in timing and countdown features provide granular control over scene activation and deactivation. Constructed from flame-retardant PC material, this switch is designed for durability and safety. Available in a range of stylish colors – white, black, gold, and gray – it complements any décor.

specifications.description: The Tuya WiFi Smart Power Strip is a versatile smart outlet designed to simplify power management and enhance convenience. This power strip features four AC outlets and three USB ports (USB-A and USB-C), offering flexible power distribution for various devices.  It supports a wide range of fast charging protocols for smartphones, tablets, and other USB-powered devices.  Control your power strip remotely via the Tuya Smart App, schedule power on/off times, and monitor energy consumption.  Built with a durable, fire-resistant PC+ABS casing, this power strip is designed for safety and long-lasting performance.  The 2.4GHz WiFi connectivity ensures reliable and stable connection to your home network.

specifications.description: The TUYA Zigbee Smart DIY Module is a compact and versatile solution for creating custom smart home automations. This module enables seamless integration with TUYA Smart Home platform, allowing users to control various devices through a mobile app. It supports both Zigbee and Wi-Fi connectivity, providing flexibility in network setup. The module is designed for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike, offering a simple way to add smart functionality to existing appliances and devices. Its small size and lightweight design make it ideal for discreet installation.

specifications.description: The TUYA Zigbee Smart DIY Module is a compact and versatile solution for creating custom smart home automations. This module enables seamless integration with TUYA Smart Home ecosystem and supports a wide range of DIY projects. It offers flexible power options and easy installation, making it ideal for both beginners and experienced users.  The module utilizes a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connection for control and is designed for easy integration with other smart devices.  Its small size and lightweight design allow for discreet placement within various environments.

specifications.description: The Tuya Zigbee 1-Channel Smart DIY Module is a compact and versatile solution for creating customized smart home automations. This module enables you to control a single AC device (up to 10A or 16A depending on the model) through a user-friendly mobile application. Its miniature design allows for discreet installation in various DIY projects, seamlessly integrating with your existing smart home ecosystem.  It utilizes Zigbee communication for reliable and low-power operation, offering enhanced security and privacy compared to Wi-Fi based solutions.  The module is designed for easy integration with a wide range of smart home platforms and is ideal for controlling lights, appliances, and other compatible devices.
